code: import React from"react";export function Container(_ref){var fluid=_ref.fluid,children=_ref.children;return React.createElement("div",{className:"container".concat(fluid?"-fluid":"")},children);}export function Row(_ref2){var fluid=_ref2.fluid,children=_ref2.children;return React.createElement("div",{className:"row".concat(fluid?"-fluid":"")},children);}export function Col(_ref3){var size=_ref3.size,children=_ref3.children;return React.createElement("div",{className:size.split(" ").map(function(size){return"col-"+size;}).join(" ")},children);}
